sentences.english: Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省气象台昨天傍晚发布浙江沿海地区强台风紧急警报。

sentences.english: The typhoon is the cause of the electricity black-out .
sentences.chinese: 这个台风是造成停电的起因。

sentences.english: The hurricane last night destroyed many survey markers.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚台风摧毁了很多觇标。

sentences.english: I was at home when the typhoon hit.
sentences.chinese: 台风来袭的时候，我正待在家里。

sentences.english: Chapter 84 According to the weather report, the typhoon is coming tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 根据气象报告，明天将有台风。

sentences.english: The purpose of this event is to raise funds for Typhoon Morakot victims.
sentences.chinese: 这次的活动是为了替莫拉克台风的灾民筹款。

sentences.english: The price of vegetables keeped increasing after the typhoon.
sentences.chinese: 台风过后蔬菜价格持续上涨。
我们面临中度台风的侵袭。

sentences.english: Taitung area in the early morning before the emergence of typhoon circling foehn .
sentences.chinese: 台东一带则于清晨台风绕圈前出现焚风。

sentences.english: Typhoon Megi is the strongest storm the Philippines has faced for four years.
sentences.chinese: 台风“鲇鱼”是菲律宾近四年所遭受的最强台风。

sentences.english: Typhoon Megi is the strongest storm the Philippines has faced for four years.
sentences.chinese: 台风“鲇鱼”是菲律宾近四年所遭受的最强台风。

sentences.english: The committee access the damage cause by the typhoon at $ 100000.
sentences.chinese: 委员会估计台风所造成的损失为10万美元。

sentences.english: The ships are anchored in the harbour, safe from the typhoon.
sentences.chinese: 船只已在港内下了锚，不会受到台风的威胁。

sentences.english: The typhoon, referred to locally as Milenyo, caused floods and landslides that have displaced some 5,500 people.
sentences.chinese: 台风造成的水灾和塌方使大约5500人无家可归。

sentences.english: Thee typhoon is moving westward at a speed of 20 kilometers per hour.
sentences.chinese: 台风电母以时速20公里的速度向西而去。

sentences.english: Go clamming is also a dangerous work with a willy-willy(typhoon) .
sentences.chinese: 在台风天的拾蛤蜊也是份危险的工作。

definition: El Niño effect, equatorial climatic variation over the Pacific Ocean
pinyin: e4 er3 ni2 nuo4 xian4 xiang4

definition: El Niño, equatorial climate variation in the Pacific
La Niña, equatorial climatic variation over the Eastern Pacific, as opposed to El Niño 厄爾尼諾|厄尔尼诺
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
